SEARCH
Package app.src.resources

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
app.src.resources.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Arrow, Bow, Corosshair, Monster
public class Entity extends Object
Creates an Entity that serves as a base for Monsters and other actors.
See Also:
  • BufferedImage
  • Rectangle

  • Field Details

    • rect

      public Rectangle rect
      Rectangle to track size and location of the Entity

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(BufferedImage loadedImage, int x, int y, int health)
      Takes an image name, coordinates and health value to create an Entity. Loads the image from app/src/resources/assets. Takes width and Height from the image to create a Rectangle
      Parameters:
      loadedImage - previously loaded Image
      x - x coodinate for the location
      y - y coodinate for the location
      health - determines how much damage an entity can take before death

  • Method Details

    • setNoise

      public void setNoise(Clip noise)
      Takes a Clip object to set as the noise of the Monster.
      Parameters:
      noise - noise that the Monster will make

    • getNoise

      public Clip getNoise()
      Retunrs the Clip object stored in the noise value or null.
      Returns:
      Clip object or null

    • makeNoise

      public void makeNoise()
      Plays the audio Clip stored in the noise variable.

    • setCharging

      public void setCharging(boolean state)
      Sets the state of the charging variable to either true of false.
      Parameters:
      state - indicates, if the charge variable should be increased or not

    • getCharging

      public boolean getCharging()
      Indicates, if the charge variable should be increased or not.
      Returns:
      true, if the charge variable is currently beeing increased

    • setHealthbar

      public void setHealthbar()
      Sets the Healthbar variable to true and inidcates that a healthbar should be drawn for the Entity.

    • setPlayerLocation

      public void setPlayerLocation(int playerX, int playerY)
      Takes x and y coordinates to store in the playerLocation Point.
      Parameters:
      playerX - new x coordinate
      playerY - new y coordinate

    • getPlayerLocation

      public Point getPlayerLocation()
      Returns the playerLocation variable.
      Returns:
      playerLocation

    • setState

      public void setState()
      Sets the state of the Entity to false. Entities with state false will be removed.

    • getState

      public Boolean getState()
      Returns the state of an Entity.
      Returns:
      state of Entity

    • setTAG

      public void setTAG(String newTAG)
      Takes a String to set as a TAG. TAGs are used as a identifier.
      Parameters:
      newTAG - TAG to be set

    • getTAG

      public String getTAG()
      Returns the TAG of an Entity.
      Returns:
      TAG of Entity

    • setCooldown

      public void setCooldown(int newCooldown)
      Takes an int Value and stores it in the cooldwon variable.
      Parameters:
      newCooldown - Value for the new cooldown

    • getCooldown

      public int getCooldown()
      Returns the cooldown of an Entity.
      Returns:
      cooldown of Entity

    • decreaseCooldown

      public void decreaseCooldown()
      Decreases the Entity cooldown by 1.

    • update

      public void update()
      Base Method for extended classes. Reduces the cooldown, if it is set. Initiates death when Entity health is below zero.

    • rotateImage

      public void rotateImage(double angle)
      Takes an angle and rotates the Image of the Entity. The original Image is used as base for the rotation.
      Parameters:
      angle - rotation angle

    • scaleImage

      public void scaleImage(double factor)
      Takes a factor and scales the Image of the Entity. The original Image is used as base for the scaling. If the healthbar option is set, a healthbar will be drawn.
      Parameters:
      factor - scaling factor

    • getImage

      public BufferedImage getImage()
      Returns the Entity's image.
      Returns:
      Entity's image

    • setImage

      public void setImage(BufferedImage newImage)
      Takes an image and stores it.
      Parameters:
      newImage - new image to be stored

    • setOriginalImage

      public void setOriginalImage(BufferedImage newImage)
      Takes a BufferedImage and stores it as originalImage.
      Parameters:
      newImage - Image to be stored as originalImage

    • getMultiplier

      public int getMultiplier(Point point)
      Takes a point and checks, if it collides with any of the Entities Hitbox. Returns the highest multiplier value of collided Hitboxes.
      Parameters:
      point - Point for collision detection
      Returns:
      multiplier value

    • addHitBox

      public void addHitBox(int width, int height, int offsetX, int offsetY, int multiplier)
      Creates a Hitbox with size, offsets and damage multiplier.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the Hitbox
      height - height of the Hitbox
      offsetX - x offset to Entity location
      offsetY - y offset to Entity location
      multiplier - multiplier for received damage of this Hitbox

    • updateHitBoxes

      public void updateHitBoxes(int newX, int newY)
      Takes new coordinates and updates the location of all registered hitboxes.
      Parameters:
      newX - new x corrdinate
      newY - new y corrdinate

    • scaleHitBoxes

      public void scaleHitBoxes(double factor)
      Takes a factor value to scale all Hitboxes.
      Parameters:
      factor - scaling factor

    • getHitBoxes

      public List<Hitbox> getHitBoxes()
      Returns a list of all Hitboxes.
      Returns:
      all Hitboxes

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation(int newX, int newY)
      Takes x and y coordinates to set a new location for the Entity.
      Parameters:
      newX - new x coordinate for the Entity
      newY - new y coordinate for the Entity

    • getLocation

      public Point getLocation()
      Returns the Entity's location.
      Returns:
      Entity's location

    • getDrawPosition

      public Point getDrawPosition()
      Returns the Entity's drawing location (top left corner).
      Returns:
      Entity's drawing location

    • getSpeed

      public int getSpeed()
      Returns the Entity's speed.
      Returns:
      Entity's speed

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed(int newSpeed)
      Takes a int value and stores it in speed.
      Parameters:
      newSpeed - new value to be stored

    • getDistance

      public int getDistance()
      Returns the Entity's distance.
      Returns:
      Entity's distance

    • setDistance

      public void setDistance(int value)
      Takes a int value and stores it in distance.
      Parameters:
      value - new value to be stored

    • updateDistance

      public void updateDistance()
      Gets distance and speed of the Entity to calculate the new distance.

    • setHealth

      public void setHealth(int value)
      Takes an image and stores it.
      Parameters:
      value - new image to be stored

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Returns the health value of the Entity.
      Returns:
      health of Entity

    • updateHealth

      public void updateHealth(int value)
      Takes a int value and adds it to the Entity's health.
      Parameters:
      value - will be added to Entity health

    • death

      public void death()
      Determines what happens when the Entity dies.
